articles.description: Top US generals said Tuesday that they advised keeping American troops in Afghanistan to bolster the Afghan government and expressed concern that the Taliban has not severed ties with Al-Qaeda.

articles.title: Jalen Smereck calls for suspension of opponent after racist gesture in UHL game - The Athletic
articles.description: HC Kremenchuk forward Andrei Deniskin is facing disciplinary action from the Ukrainian Hockey League after making a racist gesture toward HC Donbass' Jalen Smereck. The American-born defenseman is Black.
articles.content: Jalen Smereck will take a leave of absence from HC Donbass after he was the target of a racist gesture from HC Kremenchuk forward Andrei Deniskin in a Ukrainian Hockey League game on Sunday. American… [+2417 chars]

articles.title: Fossilized Footprints Push Back Date of Human Arrival in Americas - ExtremeTech
